website_summaries.verdict: Five different shapes of bully stick – spring, ring, braid, barbell, sticks – give your dog plenty of variety to hold his interest while providing a nutritious occasional treat.
pros: All-natural beef bully sticks sourced from grass-fed, free-range bulls in Paraguay
Sizes range from 5 inches to 7 inches, making these bully sticks suitable for most breeds of dog
A healthy, protein-packed way to show Fido how much you love him
cons: Although these bully sticks are fairly low in calories, they should not make up a major portion of your dog's diet
Too many treats could put extra pounds on your pooch
These bully sticks smell pretty stinky, too

customer_reviews.title: A great bully stick!
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to find bully sticks that last more than a few seconds to a minute. All of these lasted my dog (a 50lb heavy chewer) a long time. We're both very happy with these.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: OUTSTANDING SERVICE + EXCEPTIONAL QUALITY & VALUE!!!  HIGHLY RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.text: This is a belated review for my last order. I originally ordered this item and packages of 12" thick braided & 9" monster braided bullys a couple of months ago. I did not leave a review because my beloved golden retriever unexpectedly passed away just before the shipment arrived. I now have a foster from a rescue group I volunteer with. She has tried and absolutely loves them ALL... as does her best dog buddy. I have just ordered more and expect to be a steady customer going forward as I am formally adopting my foster pup tomorrow. HAPPY HOLIDAYS!!
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Steginsky

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves, loves, loves these!!!
customer_reviews.text: This variety pack is great, keeps things interesting for our dog! He has liked every single one so far and chews them non stop until the bone is gone! I don't notice any odor at all but my husband does so I feel like the sensitivity to odor varies from person to person. Or maybe I have bad sinuses. But Buster likes them too much to split hairs over the smell, these are fantastic!!!
customer_reviews.author: PAsFab5

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PURCHASE!!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome variety!!! Tucker picked his first one (the small twisted with knots on the ends). He is one happy dog. I even put a pic of the bag and of the bully sticks on Instagram. I follow lots of dachshund friends and got lots of likes on the post. Thank you for a great product. ''''
customer_reviews.author: regina

customer_reviews.title: Great treat
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for small dogs. My little girl enjoys them for days. She will irk on it for an hour or two and then be back at it again the next day. Great variety of shapes to prevent treat fatigue.
customer_reviews.author: mc

customer_reviews.title: I also loved the email we received before these came
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these, he has been chewing on one for the last hour. I also loved the email we received before these came. Nice little touch. We will definitely order these again.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: Dogs loved them
customer_reviews.text: Both of the dogs love them. Made a small mess but the dogs made sure to clean up after themselves.
customer_reviews.author: KMGCFH

customer_reviews.title: The special note from the CEO is fantastic. I love the personal touch there
customer_reviews.text: The special note from the CEO is fantastic. I love the personal touch there. My dog is an aggressive chewer so I try to keep her stocked so she does not get bored. I will definitely be ordering from Pawstruck again! Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Marisa M.

customer_reviews.title: He seemed to love it. I like the variety pack
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 120# rottweiler who loves chews but goes through them rapidly. I had previously bought other bully sticks that were hollow in the middle and only lasted a minute or two. These were solid all the way through and it took Titan 45 minutes or more to get through the braided one. He seemed to love it. I like the variety pack, helps to keep things interesting for my pup.
customer_reviews.author: Maranda

customer_reviews.title: Finally, not smelly and good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Very good! Not smelly and dog loves it. I have a 3 month old st bernard and it takes her at least 1 hour to chew up each one. Will be ordering again!
customer_reviews.author: InfamousS

customer_reviews.title: Not made in China BUT....
customer_reviews.text: My 3 month old Aussie loves it. Keeps him busy and fulfill his need to chew something. It smells like dried fish but I don’t really mind. However, I’m disappointed that it says “made in Paraguay, Brazil, Colombia, New Zealand, Peru, or Turkey.” That makes me wonder how quality is controlled. My dog hasn’t gotten sick yet but I wouldn’t buy this brand again because I don’t really know where it comes from. I mean, at least it’s not from China, right?
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t get the variety described but good sticks
customer_reviews.text: Good bully sticks but definitely didn’t even come close to what they described, from what I received. From the their description, I was supposed to get a couple pretzel & knot type bully sticks too but from the picture you see they substitute those for just straight sticks. That’s nice that they gave me 17 likes stated but I purposely brought this variety pack for the twists and sticks that weren’t straight because they take my two dogs longer to chew up. They were good steaks and sicker than the smaller sizes I’ve gotten from this company, just be warned if you’re expecting everything in the description you might not get it.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves these! Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these! We have bought other "bully sticks" from other brands before. These are by far his favorite. Yes, THEY SMELL, but isn't that the point? My dog loves how they taste! Super high quality. I would recommend this variety pack so your pup can get different shapes.
customer_reviews.author: Linz

customer_reviews.title: Good price for this product
customer_reviews.text: Good price for this product. My puppy loves these bully sticks so much that I have them on auto order. Bully sticks sold individually in the store are expensive and those sold in bulk usually smell horrible when I open the package. These do not have a significant odor to them and are perfect for this very active, very chew happy 9 month old goldendoodle. My only wish is that they were all similar sized. The little one only lasts moments around here!
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Very large
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was quick, but my disappointment is with the size of the bully sticks. The round one was fine, but the other ones were way too large for my mini Dachshund. I will give them to friends who have larger dogs. The price for the bully sticks were great.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Grabley

customer_reviews.title: Smaller Package Than Anticipated But My Dog Loves Them
customer_reviews.text: I received a smaller amount of product than I anticipated (it was the correct amount; I just didn't realize it would be that small when I ordered it), but my dog loves these chews as bully sticks are his favorite. I took off a star for the value, but he would probably give them five stars for taste and chewing fun.
customer_reviews.author: BarbN Lesniak

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love them, but too thin for lengthy chew sessions.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these looking for something to keep my two 4 month old large breed pups busy when they're in the Crates if I'm busy doing something where they need to be confined. My vet said to buy bully sticks. The dogs took to them right away, but they're a lot smaller than I expected and they went through the bag considerably faster than others I've purchased. The only real good ones in the bag was a horseshoe shaped one and one thick straight one, the others were thin and small. Guess we're going with other Labrador owner recommendations and try Elk Antlers next.
customer_reviews.author: JanisW

customer_reviews.title: The BEST deal in Bully Sticks!
customer_reviews.text: This is BY FAR, the GREATEST deal I’ve ever received on Bully Sticks! My girl loves these, normally I’m spending $12 to $20 on just one stick the same size as one in this pack, here you’re getting 7! This is ABSOLUTELY the only Bully Sticks I’ll be purchasing in the future. Sure when you pull these out of the bag there is a slight aroma but there is with any of these, it’s not like I could smell them from a few feet away as she devours them. Thank you for creating a price conscious, long lasting dog chew!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Mardorf

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing!!!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not ordering again!!!! My Shih Tzu was so excited when I gave her a new bully stick. Chewed on it about 30-45 minutes and left it alone. She was done! She licked ad chewed the outer coating of the bully stick, dumbbell and the spring that were given to her over 4 days. She ignores them and plays with her stuffed toys. Never should have never changed from Red Barn!!! Not worth $25.99!!!
customer_reviews.author: Carol Ann Jennings

customer_reviews.title: Dog loved it, but gone too fast
customer_reviews.text: My 45 lb dog who is an avid chewer of all things he is not supposed to chew and picky about what 'dog' chews and treats he will eat. He loved this immediately.I was only disappointed because it was gone within 45 minutes. Overall,
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Fam

customer_reviews.title: Dog didn’t like braided one...
customer_reviews.text: Something about the Large braided one freaked my Lab out. He took it from me, dropped it, Reid sniffing several times and would jump back like smthg about it was scary. He’s 10, and eats other brands of braided or regular bullies several times week. He was willing to eat the straight one. And my Boxador puppy was fine with the barbell one. I took the braided one and then it it in a separate zip lock bag in case there is a big or something in it that I can’t see....
customer_reviews.author: Violet203

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the pup busy!
customer_reviews.text: Pricey, but my pup LOVES them. Many other brands he just sniffs and leaves sitting, but these always get his FULL attention until they are gone!
customer_reviews.author: Mar

customer_reviews.title: Great variety
customer_reviews.text: My doggo Loved these and I think it's because he gets bored of the same thing, the different size and shapes kept him interested.
customer_reviews.author: Ade

customer_reviews.title: Our Puppy Loves These
customer_reviews.text: Our Puppy Loves These Bully Sticks! Thanks to bully sticks, nothing has been destroyed in our home since bringing our puppy home a month ago. Whenever she has the urge to chew, there is a bully stick. No odor and lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: mckylie

customer_reviews.title: If you have a puppy, this is a must
customer_reviews.text: My 3 month old Collie Pyrenees puppy LOVES these. The variety pack has been perfect for him. Each one takes him a different amount of time to chew down. The braided ones take him about 2 days versus the straight ones he can finish in a day. The curly ones he just LOVES to play with it because interactive because it rolls away from him (we have carpenter floors). Anyway it’s a great buy and since he’s in teething mode, this keeps his teeth occupied gnawing on that instead of my furniture or worst my shoes!!
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Great bully sticks
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these bully sticks, but I personally can't stand the smell. But it keeps my 10- month old St. Berdoodle from eating my molding.
customer_reviews.author: Princess

customer_reviews.title: Great chew toys but not for large breed dogs
customer_reviews.text: Great chew toys but not for large breed dogs...they might have lasted 20 minutes with my labs, the puppy made it last longer...
customer_reviews.author: Crazyrunner

customer_reviews.title: Won't last long at all for aggressive chewers
customer_reviews.text: I have to start by saying that I love Pawstruck. However, I just purchased two items that were not what I expected. The items were smaller in size than I had anticipated and so will not last long at all and therefore aren't a good value. I will go back to buying their monster bully sticks for my dog. At least with the monster braids, I can give it to my dog for 10 minutes at a time to make it last for a week. These chews are gone in 10 minutes. Pretty costly!
customer_reviews.author: Sundance

customer_reviews.title: Beagle approved
customer_reviews.text: Our visiting beagle loves these sticks as a treat when she spends time with us. Tries to hide rawhide sticks, but wants to chew on these first thing
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Variety Pack
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly. I have quite the little chewer, and she has enjoyed the pieces I've given her so far.
customer_reviews.author: Susanna

customer_reviews.title: Best chews out there!
customer_reviews.text: My puppy loves these! This is the 2nd time I've ordered them! My pup is super picky so I'm glad we've found something to help him while he teethes! My only complaint is there is 1 treat in the bunch that my pup eats so quickly that he always throws up so I have to watch him and take it away after eating so much. It's the lighter more hollow stick. They're that good!
customer_reviews.author: TheAwesomeKira

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting bag of bully pizzle!
customer_reviews.text: I've bought quite a variety of different kinds of bully sticks/pizzle before, but this one is one of my favorite next to Jack&Pup! The variety is wonderful, the scent is very minimal and the pieces are pretty wide and huge! My 8 month old puppy Bruno loves them, and he can chew through other bully sticks fairly quickly. Just the braid alone is enormous and Bruno has been gnawing at it for about a week! Highly recommend :)
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Pup loves em.
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves them. He's a really heavy chewer and these keep him busy for a good while. My pup says they're a hit and we'll be ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: They are fine, but...
customer_reviews.text: The price is good. A bit disappointed bc they last about six minutes for my Pitbull puppy. The different shapes are fun and I think that idea is awesome to get a dog’s attention. These are just weaker than the grocery ones I bought. Still shopping for more durable bully sticks! I’m thinking the good reviews are right for less aggressive chewers. I hope this review helps others with tough chewers!
customer_reviews.author: kellylaurel

customer_reviews.title: Excellent variety and quality. Buy them u will be very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have two French Mastiffs. These are quality bully products and large enough for them. I will continue to order. Glad i finally found a goid company and the price is great ☺🖒
customer_reviews.author: holly jericiau

customer_reviews.title: Def get this for teething puppies
customer_reviews.text: Our 11 week old puppy loves these bully sticks! I was so surprised that he bit almost half the round bully stick down! He's constantly biting and chewing on things so it's great to have a bunch of bully sticks on hand (he gets bored easily). Keeps him occupied and entertained. The bully stick will start to smell after a while, especially after it becomes white, soft and soggy.
customer_reviews.author: Ling C

customer_reviews.title: Not a tasty treat
customer_reviews.text: I have two dogs neither of them would eat the bully sticks. I even had my sisters dog come over for the day and she wouldn’t touch it either. The quality of taste was not in those bones. Had to be thrown out. Will never buy from this brand again. Avoid at all costs
customer_reviews.author: Babak nouri

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves them, fair price for amount and size
customer_reviews.text: I picked rating of 5 for flavor as the dog seems to think they are tasty (I didn't taste them myself🙂. Not bad price and the treats are the largest size as described. About same price as a pack of 3 of smaller size at the local store. Will buy again when these are gone. Also, they don't smell bad like some of these products do.
customer_reviews.author: Joe C.

customer_reviews.title: good quality and good price for small dogs.
customer_reviews.text: nice selection and good price for what you get...my 3 dogs are all over 150# so I think next time I need to order a larger size. They ate them all up in a day!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Bohmann

customer_reviews.title: Best Bully Sticks !!
customer_reviews.text: Very fast shipping and all of the bully sticks are of GREAT quality !! I couldn't get the bag opened up fast enough for my 2 dogs 🐶🐶 to start chewing away. I'm 100% happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Jae

customer_reviews.title: Picky pup
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately my dog didn't really care for them, or his tastes have changed since he's also snubbed some other treats he used to like. Having said that, I still give a 5 star rating due to the fact that the smell was low, good value for how many you get and overall good customer service in the form of a nice email I received after purchase. I would reccomend this product, just didn't work out with my pupper.
customer_reviews.author: kmack

customer_reviews.title: Great for super chewers
customer_reviews.text: Lasts pretty long for my 110 lb Great Pyrenees super chewer . Actually takes him a bit too get through it which I can't say about any other bullysticks . Nice variety of sizes and shapes and no bad odor . I gave them 3 stars for longevity because nothing can last long with my dog
customer_reviews.author: v white

customer_reviews.title: Five Star Treats!
customer_reviews.text: I have to be honest--there is not much my pup does NOT like--she's pretty indiscrimate and has atrocious tabler manners, so saying she enjoyed her Pawstruck treats really doesn't mean a whole lot. HOWEVER . . . I personally loved the fact that the treats were odor-free and the variety kept Daphne from being bored. The price was also very reasonable considering the quality, size and number of treats included. I highly recommend Pawstruck--they really provide a quality product at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: lianekaye

customer_reviews.title: Makes a busy puppy happy
customer_reviews.text: Josie the super chewer, says many thanks for this variety pack of her fav: bully sticks. While humans may not love the smell all of the time, they are grateful for the quality of the product that keeps her so busy.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth J. Tarry-crowe

customer_reviews.title: Good value but don’t last long
customer_reviews.text: I decided to try this variety pack when the bully sticks I normally buy were not available. These are much thinner, and none of them lasted her more than a few hours. They are low odor and cheaper than some other brands for the amount you get. I have a 7 mos terrier
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pup Likes But STINKY like something DIED
customer_reviews.text: I've never understood what people were talking about when they said that their bully sticks smelled like something literally died and rotted.... until these. Most of them were fine, but there were 3/4 that completely obliterated my soul. Like I couldn't give my adorable Aussie puppy kisses anymore.... which let me tell you, is a feat. Also, I got the small ones... Puppy was around 9lb when these came and they were way too small. And the size differences between the bully sticks are pretty huge.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: The chews are a little expensive but well worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: Our two Bull Mastiffs love these chews. One is 5 months old and the other is 9 years old. The only problem we have is the younger one keeps taking the older ones chew the first chance she gets!:) so we keep them each in their own room when we let them have their chews!
customer_reviews.author: tried and true

customer_reviews.title: Dogs ate fast!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 12 pound polmeranian and a 3 pd Yorkie. Polm had hers gone in 20 minutes and Yorkie 70 minutes. I bought them thinking they'd last a couple days per stick but not the case. They bag was smaller than I thought. Did not seem worth the money I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Mkchic

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves them!
customer_reviews.text: Dog loved this! I have a shitzu and he devoured the twist in 10-15 minutes! He knew as soon as I opened the package that it was for him and got all excited! I'm not sure why the package for small dogs is the same price as the big bones, seems like less product should be cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Shalome

customer_reviews.title: Not durable.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely expensive for what you get. They don't last very long at all. Not durable. That being said, my dogs did love chewing on them.
customer_reviews.author: Milonius

customer_reviews.title: Happy puppy!! Keeps her busy for short amount of time (: Keeps her from nipping
customer_reviews.text: My puppy loves them!! I know bones are not the best for dogs, so I only give in moderation. But this is the only thing that keeps her busy for a long time!!! She doesn’t play with toys or other bones for a long time by herself yet, but man can she chew on these for a long time. Happy puppy, happy life! However, she does chew them very fast, which is concerning like an 1/2 hour to hour or so. She is chihuahua puppy and can get threw them very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Tasha Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love them!
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs go crazy for these. Our lab runs around with the "zoomies" when we give him one. Our GSD chews on them then will hide it to save it for later. They last about a day with our boys but if they are steadily chewing on them, maybe a couple hours. The wording on the package was cute and clever. I highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: KellyR

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: My maltipoo LOVES these and I love the variety! Certainly can't find this variety for this price in any pet store! I just signed up for the month subscription because I kept track of my last order and I found I'm ordering again about a month out. These are great because my baby is teething now and he always finishes the treat.
customer_reviews.author: RG

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not that big
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for our 8 and 10 week old husky puppies. The bully sticks are certainly durable and the dogs seem to like them. I put a picture to show the size of the bag relative to a banana for reference. I think large breed dogs may find these a bit small, but good for medium sized. The price for the number you get of these is pretty good compared to other sellers. These don’t have a strong or noticeable smell.
customer_reviews.author: edsjrs5

customer_reviews.title: can't afford those at that price
customer_reviews.text: no good --my morkie went right threw them--very thin--can't pay 25.00 a week --for those---got great bullys from amazon that last for weeks --not days--he could play with GIGABITE bully for days---these he ate up in minutes--not good--there gone already!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: sandra a.

customer_reviews.title: Dried up wrinkly bull weiner
customer_reviews.text: Second time purchasing from pawstruck, first time was ok and this time they looked overdryed and hallow in the middle. Will not be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: eric

customer_reviews.title: My 2 dogs love them
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love them, leave no mess, and best of all, my dog with a sensitive stomach can eat them without getting sick. It's the only chew stick I've ever found that she can eat!
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my pup entertained
customer_reviews.text: My siberian teething puppy loves this variety pack. Keeps her busy, seems to love the taste. The only thing I would say that I gave a star off is the smell is strong to me when u first open pack, but she is not bothered by it. :) Wish there was another ring in their as she seems to like that one the best and it keeos her occupied the longest. Definately order again, nice fast delivery!
customer_reviews.author: Gina Maggiore

customer_reviews.title: Great product and price!
customer_reviews.text: Great bundle at a great price. Bones were not hollow as some I have order online before were. Great quality and my dog is thoroughly enjoying! Will continue to buy this pack!
customer_reviews.author: JHammonds

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves these but they don't last long
customer_reviews.text: These bully sticks are priced reasonably compared to what they cost individually at the pet store. My 4 year old Bully really enjoys them, but they don't last long. He's usually done with one within a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: MWatkins

customer_reviews.title: Good Treats - Go Quickly
customer_reviews.text: My Austrailian Cattle Dog loves these Bully products! The only thing I didn't like about these is that she chewed through them quickly. Some of them she was able to demolish in a matter of minutes. For longer lasting canine pleasure I would recommend the 12-inch Braided Bully Sticks. You can get a pack of two cheaper than this variety pack and they last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Mark C. Morris

customer_reviews.title: My Blue Heeler is crazy for bully sticks!
customer_reviews.text: My puppy goes wild over these bully sticks and the humans she owns like them, too, because they are low odor. She can chew on the braided one for an hour! She goes through the smaller ones pretty quickly, as she's a super-chewer. Zoey gives these bully sticks two paws up (with a little drool on the side).
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves them—just don’t step on them
customer_reviews.text: These are great and my dog loves them—but stepping on the bones with the knotted ends hurts worse than stepping on a LEGO. Do yourself a huge favor, and only give them to your dog on areas where there’s a good color contrast between the bone and the flooring, otherwise you’ll create new curse words that have not existed up until that knot ends up under your foot.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Ezzell-Maddy

customer_reviews.title: Smaller pups beware
customer_reviews.text: We have a bone enthusiast westie and these bones are not for him. He has gotten sick since we have given these to him and we have successfully narrowed it down to these bones which have made him vomit. I just honestly wouldn’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Aljalbro

customer_reviews.title: They are not low odor
customer_reviews.text: These smelled pretty bad out of the package and when our dog started chewing on them. Anywhere she chewed these bone at, smells now. She also ate them pretty fast. Will not be buying these again. It's a shame because I like the different shapes but we can't get over the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Jo G

customer_reviews.title: Your dog will love these!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these treats. I give him one a day and it takes him a long time to eat it. You can't really smell them unless you put it right up to your nose. Whatever makes him happy!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent
customer_reviews.text: The first package I ordered was great. I was really excited to find these at such a great price. The second package I received, the bully sticks were very hard and crunchy. The pup at them in less than 5 minutes because they didn't require chewing. They were very brittle and just fell apart. Will not be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Foxtrot Sierra

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: My dogs really like to chew, so I was looking for something that would keep them occupied for a while. And these worked. I and one of my dogs didn’t like the smell. I just open and close the bag quickly and my dog gets over the smell teapot fast. The sticks must look that tempting to him!. I will buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: My pups love these things....
customer_reviews.text: I have two small pups, one 13 years and the other four months old. The old guy mostly gums the straight sticks, but the pup chews on the others fairly consistently. I have to space handing out new ones though, otherwise they get buried in chairs, beds and so on. Over two weeks I have gotten maybe five out and still have plenty left.
customer_reviews.author: pduz

customer_reviews.title: Puppy LOVES these!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these! They are much better then the ones in the store. These smell a little because they are chemical free. Exactly what I was looking for to keep my puppy occupied.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Small Puppy Discovers Bully Treats!
customer_reviews.text: Back story to 2 weeks ago. 6 months old only been in the backyard except for visits in the house with sibling. I have used your treats for teaching and comfort. She loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Nice selection
customer_reviews.text: Interesting shapes made for excitement from our Coonhound. Some shapes lasted longer, like the circle or the braid. The smell is not bad at all. Excellent quality.
customer_reviews.author: DruW.RN

customer_reviews.title: Pups loved these!
customer_reviews.text: My two Portuguese Water Dog puppies absolutely loved these and the shapes were awesome and made them more interesting for the little guys. I did not notice any odor at all. I will definitely buy these again! Gave me hours of peace which is difficult to get with puppies.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen M. Burch

customer_reviews.title: Good for mellow chewers
customer_reviews.text: These were great. My shih tzu is very picky but loved these. I was able to cut them in half with a bit of effort but the small barbell ones you can’t cut. My pup couldn’t eat those ones ☹️ He went thru them pretty quick so be aware of that. They don’t last that long.
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle

customer_reviews.title: THE PERFECT BONE BAG
customer_reviews.text: This bag of bones is amazing!! Even my hard to give treats -18 yr old pup, Loved to chew these bones. The bones were full of flavor, (per my pups "attitude"), Great selection of sizes too...I love buying this bag of bones, just like my pups love to chew them
customer_reviews.author: Customer - Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Dog could not get enough
customer_reviews.text: She loved these so much that when we left the house she jumped up onto the table and grabbed the closed bag. When we got home (about an hour later) all of them were consumed. Dog approved.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: FOUL smelling
customer_reviews.text: The smell that is released when these chews get eaten is absolutely the foulest thing I've smelled. My dog apparently loved it. But her breath after eating them was equally rank. Never again. I'll stick with Red Barn brand, they don't stink.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Arias

customer_reviews.title: Nice Selection
customer_reviews.text: my dogs love them and keeps them busy. would be nice if they made a bigger bag for bulk price.
customer_reviews.author: CJ DE ME

customer_reviews.title: Little Dog Loves Them
customer_reviews.text: My little 20 lb. Manchester terrier loves this bag of chew treats he’s a real chewer and if I don’t keep lots of chew treats we get in trouble with him chewing the wrong things. There’s hardly in scent, don’t know about favor I’m not trying them but he loves them and the cost is low considering other products out there seem like a great company for pets!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Moon

customer_reviews.title: no bad smell. Didn’t take my dogs days to chew them
customer_reviews.text: I like that they don’t smell or give my dogs bad breath. My only negative, is they seem easy to chew. They sill lasted over an hour. There was 2” left the next day
customer_reviews.author: pcnluvDi

customer_reviews.title: Dogs loved them but...
customer_reviews.text: My two rescue dogs chewed these up, but they had some gastrointestinal problems afterwards. I was wondering if anyone had the same problems with their dogs?
customer_reviews.author: msempress

customer_reviews.title: Showed up rotten and stinky
customer_reviews.text: Do not recommend ordering these. Opened up bag when I got them and they smelled AWFUL. Like something was rotting. I have purchased many bully sticks for my dog over the years. They have never smelled like this. Out of curiosity I pulled a few out of the bag and found them soft and gut wrenchingly stinky.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea West

customer_reviews.title: Lasts about an hour for my small dogs
customer_reviews.text: My dogs are <15 lbs. and, although they love them, they can finish one in an hour. The sticks are so tiny compared to other brands and the bag is not worth $25. It’s hilarious how small they are. It’s nice that there’s variety but I probably won’t order again
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Beef Sticks
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs love these. Great beef stick quality. Love the number of sticks per bag. At least one is gone or almost gone each day. Thank you for producing a great product
customer_reviews.author: Annmtar

customer_reviews.title: dogs like them a lot, just dont last as long as i thought they would.
customer_reviews.text: the dogs, a labradoodle and a lab, go nuts over these. problem is they just eat them up in an hour or so. good news is they completely focus on these when they have them. you could probably train the dogs to clean the kitchen if they were promised a bully stick when they were through, still working on that part.
customer_reviews.author: ALAN B

customer_reviews.title: Odor free, not sticky, delicious (apparently)
customer_reviews.text: These are a great long-lasting chew that my Field Springer loves to just take up onto the couch and work on while we’re all just relaxing. It really is odor-free and doesn’t leave sticky residue anywhere like some other treats!
customer_reviews.author: the redneck and the beach baby

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: My 13 week old Corso LOVES these. They last a couple days at least.... but it still keeps him occupied, which is great. I haven't noticed them splintering which is something I'm worried about when it comes to chews. Will be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Katie L.

customer_reviews.title: My little chihuahua loves them!
customer_reviews.text: They are a lot smaller and thinner than regular bully sticks, but they are the perfect size for my little chihuahua. She will finish one in one sitting and especially loves the twisted ones.
customer_reviews.author: Mel in SM

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves it
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t smell as bad as the bull sticks I bought before. Dog it’s it right up! Wish it would last longer than 10 minutes!
customer_reviews.author: Thea

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the variety pack and the dogs love them
customer_reviews.author: B. Smith

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves these!
customer_reviews.text: Nice variety and it keeps our puppy from chewing up other things in the house. I keep reordering these since they are very reasonably priced compared to priced in a store.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Dogs Love Them, But My Wallet Doesn't
customer_reviews.text: My dogs really love these, and they're an excellent size and variety, but they are overpriced and they do smell.
customer_reviews.author: Ami

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: Got my bag today and the dogs have been quiet for over an hour!! I love that there is a variety. My little doxie is crate bound and this definitely helped him keep busy this evening. Cant wait to buy more!
customer_reviews.author: Anna Trumbull

customer_reviews.title: Dog chewed it in less than 5 minutes
customer_reviews.text: German Shepherd chewed through the "thick" bully stick in less than 5 minutes. Very disappointed considering the price. I should have stuck with Nature Gnaws.
customer_reviews.author: Anne in MD

customer_reviews.title: Lucky loves them
customer_reviews.text: Lucky loves them. The different shapes get his attention. Great product. He is a pit bull mix and loves to chew.
customer_reviews.author: Myrna

customer_reviews.title: Love the variety
customer_reviews.text: I love having the different varieties for my dog to try. I wish it came with a few more in the pack, but compared to some other brands, its pretty good for the price. The thickness could be a little better. My dog is only 13 pounds, but she can rip through a stick in about 15 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Gunder

customer_reviews.title: Yummmm!!
customer_reviews.text: Our fur baby loves it! Love that it's all natural and doesn't get sticky. we have a pit that LOVES to chew so this surely entertained him for awhile while i was able to get stuff done! Also love the personal touch with an email from the company...it was sweet.
customer_reviews.author: Tham Le

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I expected these to last a lot longer than 15 mins for each piece. These are definitely for smaller dogs. We have a 10 month old rottie and he chewed through these really quick. Definitely don’t recommend if you have a dog that likes to chew
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: good deal but a little thin
customer_reviews.text: He loves chewing on these and i like all the different shapes. Theres no smell that i can smell.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Pup loves them, but not a good value at all
customer_reviews.text: First off my dog LOVES these things. However as the one paying for them I did not. For $25 these things are way overpriced. When I opened the package I was shocked at how tiny they were. One “piece” was literally the size of my index finger. For $5 more I usually buy a 12 pack of bully sticks from costco that are the length of my forearm. My dog is a heavy chewer and I think each of these pieces lasted him maybe 5 minutes. Great quality very poor value.
customer_reviews.author: Ruben S

product_meta.title: Bully Stick Variety Pack for Dogs | Best Mix of Natural Low-Odor Beef Stix | Pizzle Dental Treat Chews: Straight, Braided, Ring, Spring, Barbell etc.
product_meta.description:
Size:For Medium to Giant Dogs
Not sure which Bully Stick to try first? Start with our Variety Pack! You'll be sure to find your dog's favorite type of Bully Stick. 

With seven items of all different shapes and sizes, your dog is bound to fall in love. We have brought together an assortment of our best selling bully sticks that will keep your dog happy, healthy and satisfied. 

We source all of our beef from free-range and grass-fed facilities. Each of these facilities is inspected and approved by relevant governing bodies. This helps us ensure that your dog is receiving the greatest bully sticks available. 

Included in your Bully Stick bundle: 
1) 5" Straight Bully Stick (Large Thickness) 
2) 7" Straight Bully Stick (Large Thickness) 
3) 7" Braided Bully Stick 
4) Bully Stick Ring 
5) Bully Stick Spring 
6) Bully Stick Filled Esophagi 
7) Bully Stick Barbell 

Shop today, and treat your dog to what he deserves!
feature_bullets: Variety pack made up of 7 different Bully Stick for dogs. Treats include the following: 5" Straight Bully Stick (Large Thickness), 7" Straight Bully Stick (Large Thickness), 7" Braided Bully Stick, Bully Stick Ring, Bully Stick Spring, Bully Stick Filled Esophagi, and a Bully Stick Rawhide Barbell!

All of our bully sticks are made with NO artificial ingredients, NO hormones, and NO chemicals from free range, grass fed cattle. These all-natural beef pizzle dog treats are long-lasting and full-sized. We source the highest quality and best ingredients ensuring a premium low-odor product that your dog will love.

Dog dental care is important! These natural dog dental chews help to remove harmful plaque and tartar leading to improvements in overall dental health. Let your dog chew on these dental treats and watch his teeth sparkle.

Our natural bully stix for dogs are made in our own South American facilities to ensure the healthiest and safest possible dog chews. Our processing plant adheres to the strictest of quality assurance standards. Additionally, our facilities are up to governing body and outside 3rd party USA standards.

At Pawstruck, we want you to be 100% satisfied with your purchase. That's why we stand behind our 30 day SATISFACTION GUARANTEE! If you aren't happy with your variety of bully bone treats, our customer care team is ready to help. With a huge selection of Bully Sticks, Dog Chews, Dog Bones, Antlers, and more, we're confident we'll find something to suite your needs.
